Header: PM to declare 100 projects open at once
Content: Colombo (News1st): A meeting was held at the Temple Trees today (Feb 2) for the provision of supplies for the Gamperaliya and Enterprise Sri Lanka 2019 programs. The meeting was held under the patronage of Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe. The Premier noted that what hasÂ happened to them today, is that they do not have enough time to declare open what has been constructed. The Prime Minister said that he stated that they will declare 100 projects open at one occasion adding that the work has been done and that results can be shown. He went onto note that for this mechanism to work several ministries including his ministry, the ministry of finance the ministry of highways and ministry of internal affairs will work together.
